mapper.select: SELECT member_name, following_count, follower_count, member_id FROM (SELECT e.member_name, e.following_count, e.member_id, count(f.member_id) as follower_count FROM (SELECT c.member_name, count(d.member_id) as following_count, c.member_id FROM (SELECT b.member_name, b.member_id FROM (SELECT follow_member_id FROM follow WHERE member_id = #{member_id}) a INNER JOIN member b ON a.follow_member_id = b.member_id) c LEFT OUTER JOIN follow d on c.member_id = d.member_id group by c.member_name, c.member_id) e, follow f WHERE e.member_id = f.follow_member_id group by e.member_id, e.member_name, e.following_count ORDER BY e.member_name ASC) WHERE member_name like '%'||#{search}||'%'

SELECT a.following_count, count(b.member_id) as follower_count FROM (SELECT count(follow_member_id) as following_count FROM follow where member_id = 300) a LEFT OUTER JOIN follow b on 300 = b.follow_member_id GROUP BY a.following_count
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM follow WHERE member_id = #{member_id} and follow_member_id = #{follow_member_id}
